name: Galactic Petting Zoo!!!
description:
come pet animals in space onboard this galactic petting zoo :)

they come from all parts of the universe. many interesting animals to be petted.

WASD to move yourself, mouse to aim. Hold left click and move the mouse to move your hand so you can pet animals :)

Alt-f4 to quit, cmd q on mac.

TO PLAY ON MAC: You probably should use the itch.io client, otherwise you may need some chmod and gatekeeper magic to get this bad boy (which was built on windows) working on your computer.

Made with Unity 5.5 and Truss Physics and ProBuilder.

For Ludum Dare 37. One-Room. (jam, 72 hours although it was more like 24 hours all in all)
